00025 #include <FdoStd.h>

00029 
00030 /// \brief
00031 /// The FdoUnaryLogicalOperator class derives from FdoLogicalOperator and allows a
00032 /// logical "Not" to be performed against a filter.
00033 class FdoUnaryLogicalOperator : public FdoLogicalOperator
00034 {
00035 protected:
00036 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00037     /// Constructs a default instance of a UnaryLogicalOperator.
00038     FdoUnaryLogicalOperator();
00039 
00040     /// Constructs an instance of a UnaryLogicalOperator using the specified
00041     /// arguments.
00042     FdoUnaryLogicalOperator(FdoFilter* operand, FdoUnaryLogicalOperations operation);
00043 
00044     virtual ~FdoUnaryLogicalOperator();
00045 
00046     virtual void Dispose();
00047 /// \endcond
00048 
00049 public:
00050     /// \brief
00051     /// Constructs a default instance of an FdoUnaryLogicalOperator.
00052     /// 
00053     /// \return
00054     /// Returns FdoUnaryLogicalOperator
00055     /// 
00056     FDO_API static FdoUnaryLogicalOperator* Create();
00057 
00058     /// \brief
00059     /// Constructs an instance of an FdoUnaryLogicalOperator using the specified arguments.
00060     /// 
00061     /// \param operand 
00062     /// Input operand
00063     /// \param operation 
00064     /// Input operation
00065     /// 
00066     /// \return
00067     /// Returns FdoUnaryLogicalOperator
00068     /// 
00069     FDO_API static FdoUnaryLogicalOperator* Create(FdoFilter* operand, FdoUnaryLogicalOperations operation);
00070 
00071     /// \brief
00072     /// Gets the unary operation to be performed on the operand.
00073     /// 
00074     /// \return
00075     /// Returns the unary operation
00076     /// 
00077     FDO_API FdoUnaryLogicalOperations GetOperation();
00078 
00079     /// \brief
00080     /// Sets the unary operation to be performed on the operand.
00081     /// 
00082     /// \param value 
00083     /// Input the unary operation
00084     /// 
00085     /// \return
00086     /// Returns nothing
00087     /// 
00088     FDO_API void SetOperation(FdoUnaryLogicalOperations value);
00089 
00090     /// \brief
00091     /// Gets the FdoFilter operand to apply the operator to.
00092     /// 
00093     /// \return
00094     /// Returns filter
00095     /// 
00096     FDO_API FdoFilter* GetOperand();
00097 
00098     /// \brief
00099     /// Sets the FdoFilter operand to apply the operator to.
00100     /// 
00101     /// \param value 
00102     /// Input filter
00103     /// 
00104     /// \return
00105     /// Returns nothing
00106     /// 
00107     FDO_API void SetOperand(FdoFilter* value);
00108 
00109     /// \brief
00110     /// Overrides FdoFilter.Process to pass the FdoUnaryLogicalOperator to the
00111     /// appropriate filter processor operation.
00112     /// 
00113     /// \param p 
00114     /// Input filter processor
00115     /// 
00116     /// \return
00117     /// Returns nothing
00118     /// 
00119     FDO_API void Process(FdoIFilterProcessor* p);
00120 
00121 /// \cond DOXYGEN-IGNORE
00122     /// \brief
00123     /// This is an internal method. It returns the well defined text representation of the filter. 
00124     /// 
00125     /// \param pIdCol 
00126     /// A identifier collection that contains all the computed identifier used by the filter
00127     /// 
00128     /// \return
00129     /// Returns the well defined text string
00130     /// 
00131     GisString* ToStringInternal( FdoIdentifierCollection *pIdCol );
00132 /// \endcond
00133 
00134 private:
00135     FdoFilter*                  m_operand;
00136     FdoUnaryLogicalOperations   m_operation;
00137 };
